sentence.text: On comparing cytoskeletal anchoring at nuclear membrane and double-strand break repair via homologous recombination localization in the ovarian cancer cell lines SKOV-3 and Caov-3, Nesprin-2 and BRCA1 were localized to the NE envelope and the nucleus in SKOV-3, respectively, and to the cytoplasm in Caov-3 cells.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
